flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: in order to make some props to my kid costume. i decided to Upcycle the chopsticks an d made kinda Magic Wand.
guide.introduction_rendered: in order to make some props to my kid costume. i decided to Upcycle the chopsticks an d made kinda Magic Wand.

lines.text: As a Tribute to a passed away Wizard...R.I.P ,HP. Stuff Chopstick. Piece of wood. Carving Knife Sand Paper. Dremel Tool. Varnish. Make a Hole In a Piece of wood  (Dovel), start to carve the magic Wand Handle with the Carving Knife, and add some details with the Dremel. Carve the Base of the chopstick, apply some Wood Glue, some Sand paper, and finnally Varnish your New creation. And get it ready for the Next Halloween party. Pls rated it. Hope U like it .
lines.text_raw: As a Tribute to a passed away Wizard...R.I.P ,HP. Stuff Chopstick. Piece of wood. Carving Knife Sand Paper. Dremel Tool. Varnish. Make a Hole In a Piece of wood  (Dovel), start to carve the magic Wand Handle with the Carving Knife, and add some details with the Dremel. Carve the Base of the chopstick, apply some Wood Glue, some Sand paper, and finnally Varnish your New creation. And get it ready for the Next Halloween party. Pls rated it. Hope U like it .

guide.summary: Throw some Magic spells to your friends with this hand made wand.
guide.title: Chopstick Magic Wand.
